sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>small</radical> radical and the <kanji>small</kanji> kanji are exactly the same.
meaningInfo: Knowing radicals sure is nice, huh?
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>small</kanji> kanji would be the perfect gift to give to the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (<ja>しょう</ja>). The Shougun loves little things, and the <kanji>little</kanji> kanji represents all of that.
readingInfo: You read that right, shougun is written with a long <ja>う</ja> sound. Make sure you spell it right from now on!
